channel.title: Player random disconnect
channel.description:
Hey, every now and then when a player connects to my server/is playing it they get disconnected.
This message comes up in my run.bat:
[code]Godly a1pha: character file not found. Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Godly a1pha. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17840) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client Godly a1pha disconnected (cpc17-brig16-2-0-cust236.3-3.cab le.virginmedia.com)[/code]
any idea what this is or how i could prevent it from happening?

item.title: Player random disconnect
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

Hey, every now and then when a player connects to my server/is playing it they get disconnected.

This message comes up in my run.bat:

Godly a1pha: character file not found. Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Godly a1pha. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17840) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:271) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client Godly a1pha disconnected (cpc17-brig16-2-0-cust236.3-3.cab le.virginmedia.com)

any idea what this is or how i could prevent it from happening?
